data.text: Xɛɛma mu yilenma sɔnɔn, a mu sɛniyɛn.
Siyon die tide nu gbo alɔ xɛɛma,
Hali wulabare ginɛ xiɲɛ fima a xa die ma,
Kaamɛ bara a niya, diyɔrɛ nɛnyi bara kankan a naxare.
Naxee nu donse fanyi donma, kaamɛ bara e rabira taa kui.
N ma ɲama xa ɲaxankatɛ bara gbo dangife Sodomakae gbe ra,
E xa mangɛdie nu tofan dangi xɛɛma ra,
Kɔnɔ yakɔsi e fate bara fɔɔrɔ dangi tige ra,
Naxee faxa santidɛgɛma ra,
Dingɛe, marafanyi nu na naxee bɛ,
Alatala xa xɔnɛ bara kamali.
Bɔxi mangɛe mu la a ra,
Yi gbaloe kelixi a xa namiɲɔnmɛe xa yunubie nan ma,
Kɔnɔ yakɔsi e ɲɛrɛma taa kui alɔ dɔnxuie,
Mixie luma gbelegbele ra,
Alatala yɛtɛ yati nan e rayensen yɛ,
Muxu bara mali nde mamɛ,
Muxu yaxuie nu muxu ɲɛrɛ ki birin toxi,
Muxu kerimae nu xulun dangi sɛgɛe ra,
E naxa muxu rakisima fan suxu, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi.
I tan Edon ɲama naxan sabatixi Usu bɔxi ma ɲɛlɛxin yire,
Siyon ɲama, a gbe mu luxi i xa ɲaxankatɛ xa dan.
